# Color Me Booth - Complete AI/LLM Reference

## Site Information

**Site Name:** Color Me Booth
**URL:** https://ph.colormephotobooth.com
**Location:** Manila, Philippines (Metro Manila area: BGC, Makati, Alabang, Quezon City, Tagaytay)

**Description:**
Color Me Booth is Manila's first roamer coloring booth for events. We transform special moments into custom-made coloring pages on the spot. Unlike traditional photo booths that are just "a flash and a print," we provide a 15-minute creative experience that doubles as the ultimate personalized party favor.

**What We Offer:**
- Roamer coloring booth technology (no bulky booth, no lines)
- On-site custom coloring page generation using AI
- Premium crayon sets for guests
- Digital delivery via email, AirDrop, or SMS
- Professional operators for seamless event experience
- Custom branding and personalization options

**Contact & Social Media:**
- Instagram: @colorme.photobooth
- Facebook: coloringbookbooth
- Website: https://ph.colormephotobooth.com

---

## How It Works

### Three Simple Steps to Unforgettable Memories

#### 1. SNAP!
Our roamer finds your guests. No lines, no waiting. Our professional roamer operators move through your event, capturing candid moments of guests in their element.

#### 2. SKETCH!
AI instantly converts photos into beautiful line art. Using advanced AI technology, we transform each photograph into a custom coloring page in seconds.

#### 3. STYLE!
Guests color their custom pages with premium crayons. Each guest receives their personalized coloring page along with premium crayon sets (depending on package), creating an engaging, creative experience.

---

## Event Types

### 1. Kiddie Parties

**Tagline:** Manila's First Roamer Coloring Booth
**Description:** Transform birthday moments into custom coloring pages that kids love and parents appreciate.

**Key Features:**
- Main Character Energy - Every child becomes the hero of their own coloring book
- Two-in-One Value - Entertainment during the party + the loot bag giveaway
- Low-Stimulation Activity - Gives parents a 15-minute break while kids focus quietly
- Reel Ready - Process videos of kids coloring are perfect for social media

**Benefits:**
- Reduces host planning stress
- Works for toddlers, titas, and yayas (all ages)
- Premium Roamer tech (No bulky lines)
- Replaces traditional plastic loot bags with meaningful keepsakes
- Special needs friendly (calm, sensory-friendly activity)

**Why Parents Choose Us:**
Most booths are forgotten by the time the car arrives. Our "Color Me" pages end up on refrigerators, in frames, and in memory boxes for years.

**Page URL:** https://ph.colormephotobooth.com/kiddie-party

---

### 2. Weddings

**Tagline:** Elegant Entertainment for Your Special Day
**Description:** Sophisticated guest engagement with memorable keepsakes that celebrate your love story.

**Key Features:**
- Elegant Keepsakes - Guests take home beautiful line-art portraits from your special day
- Unique Guest Favors - Replace traditional favors with personalized wedding memories
- Ice Breaker Activity - Gets guests interacting and creating together during reception
- Shareable Moments - Perfect for social media, guests love sharing their colored portraits

**Benefits:**
- Elegant complement to any wedding theme
- Works for all ages - from kids to grandparents
- Professional, discreet service
- Creates lasting memories beyond the dance floor
- Bride & Groom专属 portrait sessions available

**Why Couples Choose Us:**
Most photo booths are forgotten before the cake is cut. We offer an elegant interactive experience that guests will treasure forever.

**Page URL:** https://ph.colormephotobooth.com/weddings

---

### 3. Debuts

**Tagline:** Make Your Debut Unforgettable
**Description:** Creative guest engagement for your milestone 18th birthday celebration.

**Key Features:**
- 18 Roses Theme - Perfect complement to your 18 roses tradition
- Treasured Keepsakes - Guests take home personalized debut souvenirs
- Bonding Moment - Brings friends and family together creatively
- Instagram Perfect - Your debut hashtag will be filled with colored portraits

**Benefits:**
- Perfect for 18 treasures and roses traditions
- Elegant addition to any debut theme
- Creates lasting bonds between guests
- Special portrait sessions for 18 Roses/18 Treasures
- Rose gold crayon sets for elegant touch

**Why Debutantes Choose Us:**
Your debut deserves more than cookie-cutter entertainment. Create moments that reflect your unique style and personality.

**Page URL:** https://ph.colormephotobooth.com/debuts

---

### 4. Corporate Events

**Tagline:** Innovative Team Engagement & Brand Activation
**Description:** Professional keepsakes with premium branding options for company gatherings.

**Key Features:**
- Team Building - Foster collaboration and creativity in a fun, professional way
- Brand Activation - Your logo on every print for maximum brand visibility
- Professional Keepsakes - High-quality souvenirs employees actually keep
- Social Content - Perfect for company social media and internal communications

**Benefits:**
- Full customization with company branding
- Scalable for events of any size
- Professional, reliable service
- Dedicated coordinator for premium packages
- Trusted by 50+ companies in the Philippines

**Why Companies Choose Us:**
Most corporate activities are forgettable. We provide engaging brand experiences that employees and clients actually enjoy and remember.

**Page URL:** https://ph.colormephotobooth.com/corporate-event

---

## Pricing Packages

### Kiddie Party Packages

#### The Sketch Pass (Starter Package)
**Ideal for:** Interactive party activities
**Duration:** 3 Hours of Service
**Staff:** 2 Pro Roamer Operators
**Features:**
- Unlimited Line-Art Prints
- Communal Coloring Station (Crayons Provided)
- Optional: ₱2,000/hour extension

#### The Masterpiece Bundle (Most Popular)
**Ideal for:** The ultimate all-in-one gift & entertainment
**Duration:** 3 Hours of Service
**Staff:** 2 Pro Roamer Operators
**Features:**
- Premium 8-Color Crayon Sets for every guest
- Custom Branded Borders & Event Logo
- Digital Gallery + eMail | AirDrop | SMS delivery
- Optional: ₱2,000/hour extension

---

### Wedding Packages

#### Reception Essentials (Ceremony Package)
**Ideal for:** Intimate wedding receptions
**Duration:** 4 Hours of Service
**Staff:** 2 Pro Roamer Operators
**Features:**
- Unlimited Elegant Line-Art Prints
- Premium Coloring Station Setup
- Optional: ₱2,500/hour extension

#### Grand Wedding Bundle (Most Popular)
**Ideal for:** Complete wedding entertainment experience
**Duration:** 5 Hours of Service
**Staff:** 3 Pro Roamer Operators
**Features:**
- Premium Gold-Crayon Sets for every guest
- Custom Wedding Monogram & Date on Prints
- Digital Gallery + eMail | AirDrop | SMS delivery
- Bride & Groom专属 Portrait Session

---

## Key Features & Benefits

### Roamer Technology
- **No Lines:** Our operators come to your guests, not the other way around
- **Candid Moments:** Capture natural, authentic interactions
- **Non-Intrusive:** Professional service that doesn't disrupt your event flow
- **Flexible:** Works in any venue layout

### Custom Coloring Pages
- **AI-Powered:** Instant conversion of photos to line art
- **Personalized:** Each guest receives their own custom portrait
- **Branding Options:** Add logos, themes, event details
- **High Quality:** Professional-grade prints guests will treasure

### Premium Crayon Sets
- **8-Color Sets:** Full color palette for creativity
- **Special Finishes:** Gold (weddings), Rose Gold (debuts), Corporate branding options
- **Take-Home Gift:** Doubles as party favor/giveaway
- **Quality:** Premium crayons that color smoothly

### Digital Delivery
- **Multiple Options:** Email, AirDrop (iOS), SMS
- **Instant Sharing:** Guests receive digital copies immediately
- **Social Media Ready:** Easy to share on Instagram, Facebook
- **Digital Gallery:** Online gallery for event hosts

---

## Service Areas

**Primary Coverage:** Metro Manila, Philippines
- BGC (Bonifacio Global City)
- Makati
- Alabang
- Quezon City
- Tagaytay

**Availability:** Limited slots per quarter, advance booking recommended

## Testimonials

### Kiddie Parties
- "Finally, a booth that isn't just a flash and a print. My daughter spent an hour coloring her portrait, and we've already framed it in her room!" - Joyce C., BGC Mom
- "The kids were occupied for 35 minutes straight. The parents couldn't believe it! Even the lolo and lola joined in." - Marga R., Makati
- "My son has sensory processing disorder, and loud parties overwhelm him. The coloring booth gave him a calm, happy space." - Donna L., QC

### Weddings
- "Our guests are STILL talking about the coloring booth! Even our lolo and lola who never participate in anything joined in." - Danielle & Mark, BGC
- "Elegant, unique, and absolutely charming. The coloring pages are now framed in our home." - Isabella R., Tagaytay
- "We wanted something different from the typical photo booth. This was perfect - sophisticated, interactive, and created genuine memories." - James & Sarah, Makati

### Debuts
- "My debut was perfect because of Color Me Booth! All my friends and relatives colored their portraits." - Sofia M., Alabang
- "Even my titos who never join anything were coloring! My grandma has her portrait framed in her sala." - Alexandra R., QC
- "The rose gold crayon sets were such an elegant touch!" - Gabbie L., Makati

### Corporate Events
- "Best team building activity we've ever done! Employees from different departments bonded while coloring." - Roberto S., HR Director, BPO

## Business Details

**Company Name:** Color Me Booth Manila
**Year Established:** 2026
**Service Type:** Event Entertainment & Photo Booth Services
**Technology:** AI-powered line art conversion, Roamer booth technology
**Specialization:** Custom coloring page creation for events

**Unique Selling Proposition:**
Manila's first and only roamer coloring booth. We don't just take photos - we create experiences. Unlike traditional photo booths that produce forgettable prints, Color Me Booth transforms your event into a creative, engaging activity that produces keepsakes guests will treasure for years.

**Target Events:**
- Kids' Birthday Parties (1st birthday, 7th birthday, etc.)
- Weddings & Receptions
- Debuts (18th Birthdays)
- Corporate Events (Team Building, Product Launches, Brand Activation, Company Celebrations)
- Baptisms & Christenings
- Family Reunions
- School Events

---

## Booking & Availability

**Booking Process:**
1. Select your event type and package
2. Check availability (limited slots per quarter)
3. Confirm reservation with deposit
4. Custom branding/theme consultation
5. Event execution with professional operators

**Peak Seasons:**
- Q4 (December holidays)
- Summer months (March-May)
- Wedding season (November-February)

**Recommendation:** Book 2-3 months in advance for peak seasons

---

## Technical Specifications

**Roamer Technology:**
- Portable, battery-operated photography equipment
- Professional lighting for optimal photo quality
- Instant AI processing (seconds per photo)
- High-quality photo printing on-site

**Print Specifications:**
- Line art conversion using AI technology
- Custom borders and branding options
- Premium photo paper
- Multiple sizes available

**Digital Delivery:**
- High-resolution digital copies
- Multiple delivery methods (email, AirDrop, SMS)
- Online gallery hosting
- Social media optimized formats
